attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: It keeps glitching and every time I try to open it. It says I have to re download it. It needs to be updated.. I don’t recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I personally downloaded this app to see all the Karen’s and show my support for bunker boy. The app continues to crash and glitches all the time. There’s multiple problems DONT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: Terrible app😡 took two years to download and I was staring at my phone the whole time like        👁👄👁 do not recommend this app

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app tracked my location then drowned my fish! this app took weeks downloading and then when it download someone came to my house and ate my car WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP. HORRIBLE :(

attributes.title: SO BAD
attributes.review: I opened this app and it immediately started glitching. I tried re-downloading but it did NOTHING. DO NOT get this app, very bad experience and will be telling everyone I know not to get it

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this apo to see what all the fuss was about and it is OFFICIALLY the worst app Ive ever had, it glitched really bady and made my phone freeze up I fad to force reset it so it would start working again. DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
